resources.string: This app allows you to create a collage of 2 photos in portrait mode.
Select your photos and press 2BIT to continue!
Photo saved at bottom of gallery.
Press SAVE and image will appear at bottom of gallery.
Press SAVE and image will appear in Pictures album/bottom of Gallery.
This app allows you to create a collage of 2 photos in portrait mode. Photos must be of the same size.
Collage will appear in Pictures album/bottom of gallery.
Collage will appear in Pictures album/bottom of gallery once you press SAVE.
This app allows you to create a collage of 2 photos in portrait/landscape mode.
Select your photos and press NEXT to continue!
